title: It's good
body: It doesn't closes properly when you make it into a bed like it's supposed to but that's not a major issue. Overall it's good

title: 'Good for people who lives in rent house.'
body: It's light and good quality. I would've been nice if they had bottom support of some sort to leave gap at the bottom as in regular sofa. Other than that it's good.

title: 'Good deal!'
body: 'It’s good  light weight and easy to handle.'

title: 'good one'
body: 'Ok good price wise little bit high because the internal material used is local i feel kindly ask for return time if any new purchase from company once you check lively internal material if you satisifed then only take.'

title: 'Good'
body: It's a good product, easy to unfold, but I suggest making a wooden or steel frame for the sofabed as it will sag in the long run

title: 'Great product'
body: 'Better investment than a regular sofa. Little more cushioning would have been ideal.'

title: 'Very nice quality.'
body: We can use it for both sofa and bed mode. I don't know how long it will work. But so far going good to use. It's been a month. Only cons is we need to take care of not wet in water as base of the sofa has sponge material which comes during bed foldings. We should take care while cleaning floor etc. Sofa is very light weight. Kids can lift up and down.

title: 'Comfort and design'
body: 'It is a very lightweight and comfortable and it is very good for everyday use as a sofa and a bed. I like the product design but when I ordered in the picture it was bright colour but when it delivered it not so that bright colour'

title: 'Excellent'
body: Sofa is very comfortable and amazing...The delivery was on time... It's Worth the money..

title: 'Good until you wash the cover'
body: 'I am now using this for a little over an year . I washed the cover twice and every time it shrinked a little and that caused the foams unfit and made the sofa unstable while backrest is not properly setting on its position. The sofa/bed is really useful and convenient only if you use it occasionally and don’t need to wash the covers.'

title: 'Excellent.'

title: 'Works as advertised'
body: 'The product is big enough to function as a four seater and can sleep three people. The cushioning is also great it is not soft and not too hard. I am satisfied with my purchase until now.'

title: 'Fabric and confort'
body: 'I appreciate its portability comfort and its easy handling. The fabric is just right. Recommend without hesitation.'

body: 'This product is full value for money. You can make it a bed  lounger or sofa .  Not too heavy material is washable and it fits nicely.'

title: 'Best bed cum sofa. Worth every penny'
body: 'It came on time. Light weight and comfortable sofa. It’s really nice. I ordered 6*6.5 three people can easily sleep. Look and feel also good. It’s value for money. Even my son also moving it that much light weight it is.'

title: 'Extremely Hard'
body: 'Quality is very good but it’s extremely hard bed. Seller can you please contact me.'

title: 'Good for 2-3 months only after which it will start compressing'
body: 'I ordered the product and after using it for 3 months approx i saw the one portion of it started getting compressed so i got that replaced under warranty then after 2 month the other portion started getting compressed and they said the warranty can be claimed only once and now both the portion are not in the same level and you will have backache then not worth it sorry'

title: 'Good'
body: 'My product was received on time..its so nice to sit comfort..'

title: 'I just say Wow!'
body: I have searched other company sofa cum bed and finally after reading so many positive reviews of this particular one and ordered. I received sofa next day itself (within 24hrs). Thank you Amazon and Uberlyf for a quick delivery. Coming to sofa, 3 people can sit and sleep as well.(better if it's - 2adults +1 kid). Easily convertible sofa to bed. Thank you!!

title: 'Great product
body: '4.0 out of 5 stars'This is a very useful and versatile product - we recommend it for any couple living in a rented house. Earlier the seller used to provide a metal base with slats to hoist the sofa on. This option isn't there anymore - it made it easier the maintain the sofa as dust from the floor wouldn't get to the base. Giving 4 stars for this reason.
